title: Yeshiva Accused of Misusing Symbols
body: The Hostages and Missing Families Forum is suing Yeshiva Ateret Shlomo for allegedly misusing its campaign imagery, demanding a public apology and 400,000 shekels in damages.

title: Rabbinical Courts Gain State Recognition
body: Israeli lawmakers MKs Moshe Gafni and Rabbi Yisrael Eichler push for a bill allowing monetary disputes to be settled in state-recognized rabbinical courts.
